00069 /****************************************************************************

00072

00087 
00088 function configNew(&$bn,&$bv,&$f,$i,&$uid)
00089 {
00090   global $HTTP_USER_AGENT;
00091   global $REMOTE_ADDR;
00092 
00093   # We disable the error reporting, because Konqueror 3.0.3 causes a  runtime error output that stops the program.
00094   #  could be a bug in phpsniff .. hmmm?
00095   $old_err_rep= error_reporting(E_COMPILE_ERROR|E_ERROR|E_CORE_ERROR);
00096   
00097   # Function rewritten by Thomas Wiedmann to use phpSniff class
00098   
00099   # initialize some vars
00100   if(!isset($UA)) $UA = '';
00101   if(!isset($cc)) $cc = '';
00102   if(!isset($dl)) $dl = '';
00103   if(!isset($am)) $am = '';
00104 
00105   //$timer = new phpTimer();
00106   //$timer->start('main');
00107   //$timer->start('client1');
00108   $sniffer_settings = array('check_cookies'=>$cc,'default_language'=>$dl,'allow_masquerading'=>$am);
00109   $client = new phpSniff($UA,$sniffer_settings);
00110 
00111   # get phpSniff result
00112   $i=$client->get_property('ip');
00113   $bv=$client->get_property('version');
00114   $bn=$client->get_property('browser');
00115 
00116   # translate some browsernames for "Care2x"
00117   if ($bn == 'moz') { $bn='mozilla';}
00118   else if ($bn == 'op') { $bn='opera';}
00119   else if ($bn == 'ns') { $bn='netscape';}
00120   else if ($bn == 'ie') { $bn='msie';}
00121 
00122   $uid=uniqid('');
00123   $f='CFG'.$uid.microtime().'.cfg';
00124 
00125    # Return previous error reporting 
00126    error_reporting($old_err_rep);
00127 }
00128 
00134 //$sid=uniqid('');
00135 $sid=session_id();
00136 $ck_sid_buffer='ck_sid'.$sid;
00137 
00138 include('include/inc_init_crypt.php'); // initialize crypt
00139 $ciphersid=$enc_hcemd5->encodeMimeSelfRand($sid);
00140 setcookie($ck_sid_buffer,$ciphersid);
00141 $HTTP_COOKIE_VARS[$ck_sid_buffer]=$ciphersid;
00142 
00143 #
00144 # Simple counter, counts all hits including revisits
00145 # Uncomment the following line  if you  like to count the hits, then make sure
00146 # that the path /counter/hits/ and the file /counter/hitcount.txt  are system writeable
00147 #
00148 // include('./counter/count.php');
00149 
00150 
00151 if((isset($boot)&&$boot)||!isset($HTTP_COOKIE_VARS['ck_config'])||empty($HTTP_COOKIE_VARS['ck_config'])) {
00152     configNew($bname,$bversion,$user_id,$ip,$cfgid);
00153 } else {
00154     $user_id=$HTTP_COOKIE_VARS['ck_config'];
00155 }
00156 
00157 #
00158 # Load user config API. Get the user config data from db
00159 #

00161 $cfg_obj=new UserConfig;
00162 
00163 if($cfg_obj->exists($user_id)) {
00164         $cfg_obj->getConfig($user_id);
00165         $USERCONFIG=$cfg_obj->buffer;
00166     $config_exists=true;  // Flag that user config is existing
00167 }else{
00168         $cfg_obj->_getDefault();
00169         $USERCONFIG=$cfg_obj->buffer;
00170 }
00171 
00172 # Load global configurations API
00173 require_once('include/care_api_classes/class_globalconfig.php');
00174 $glob_cfg=new GlobalConfig($GLOBALCONFIG);
00175 
00176 # Get the global config for language usage
00177 $glob_cfg->getConfig('language_%');
00178 # Get the global config for frames 
00179 $glob_cfg->getConfig('gui_frame_left_nav_width');

00181 $glob_cfg->getConfig('gui_frame_left_nav_border');

00183 $savelang=0;
00184 /*echo $GLOBALCONFIG['language_non_single'];
00185 while (list($x,$v)=each($GLOBALCONFIG)) echo $x.'==>'.$v.'<br>';
00186 */
00187 # Start checking language properties 
00188 if(!$GLOBALCONFIG['language_single']) {
00189     # We get the language code
00190     if($_chg_lang_&&!empty($lang)) {
00191                     $savelang=1;
00192         }else{
00193                 //echo $lang=$USERCONFIG['lang'];
00194         if($USERCONFIG['lang']) $lang=$USERCONFIG['lang'];
00195                             else  include('chklang.php');
00196          } 
00197 }else{
00198 
00199     # If single language is configured, we get the user configured lang
00200         if(!empty($USERCONFIG['lang']) && file_exists('language/'.$USERCONFIG['lang'].'/lang_'.$USERCONFIG['lang'].'_startframe.php')) {
00201             $lang=$USERCONFIG['lang'];
00202         } else {
00203             # If user config lang is not available, we get the global system lang configuration
00204             if(!empty($GLOBALCONFIG['language_default']) && file_exists('language/'.$GLOBALCONFIG['language_default'].'/lang_'.$GLOBALCONFIG['language_default'].'_startframe.php')) {
00205             $lang=$GLOBALCONFIG['language_default'];
00206                 } else {
00207                 $lang=LANG_DEFAULT; # Comes from inc_environment_global.php, the last chance, usually set to "en"
00208             }   
00209         }
00210 }
00211 
00212 #
00213 # After having a language code check if the critical scripts exist and set warning
00214 #
00215 $installerwarn=file_exists('./installer/install.php');
00216 if($installerwarn){
00217         #
00218         # Load necessary language tables
00219         #
00220         $lang_tables[]='create_admin.php';
00221         include_once('./include/inc_load_lang_tables.php');
00222         include_once('include/inc_charset_fx.php');
00223         include('./include/inc_installer_warning.php');
00224         #
00225         # redirect to the installer page after timeout of 5 seconds 
00226         #
00227         die('<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="5; url=./installer/">');
00228 }
00229 
00230 #
00231 # Prepare language file path
00232 #
00233 $lang_file='language/'.$lang.'/lang_'.$lang.'_startframe.php';
00234 
00235 #
00236 # We check if language table exists, if not, english is used
00237 #
00238 if(file_exists($lang_file)) {
00239     include($lang_file);
00240 } else {
00241     include('language/en/lang_en_startframe.php');  # en = english is the default language table
00242         $lang='en';
00243 }
00244 
00245 #
00246 # The language detection is finished, we save it to session
00247 #
00248 $HTTP_SESSION_VARS['sess_lang']=$lang;
00249 
00250 /*$ck_lang_buffer='ck_lang'.$sid;
00251 setcookie($ck_lang_buffer,$lang);*/
00252 
00253 /*$HTTP_COOKIE_VARS[$ck_lang_buffer]=$lang;*/

00256         if(!$config_exists) {
00257 
00258                 //$cfg_obj->getConfig('default');
00259                 //$USERCONFIG=&$cfg_obj->buffer;
00260 
00261                 configNew($bname,$bversion,$user_id,$ip,$cfgid);
00262 
00263                 $USERCONFIG['bname']=$bname;
00264                 $USERCONFIG['bversion']=$bversion;
00265                 $USERCONFIG['cid']=$cfgid;
00266         }
00267         // *****************************
00268         //save browser info to user config array
00269         // *****************************
00270         if(empty($ip)) $USERCONFIG['ip']=$REMOTE_ADDR;
00271         $USERCONFIG['mask']=$mask;
00272         $USERCONFIG['lang']=$lang;
00273         if(((($bname=='msie') ||($bname=='opera')) &&($bversion>4)) ||(($bname=='netscape')&&($bversion>3.5)) ||($bname=='mozilla')) {
00274                 $USERCONFIG['dhtml']=1;
00275         }
00276         // *****************************
00277         // Save config to db
00278         // *****************************
00279         $mask=$USERCONFIG['mask']; # save mask before serializing
00280         $cfg_obj->saveConfig($user_id,$USERCONFIG);
00281         setcookie('ck_config',$user_id,time()+(3600*24*365)); # expires after 1 year
00282 }
00283 
00284 #
00285 # save user_id to session
00286 #
00287 $HTTP_SESSION_VARS['sess_user_id']=$user_id;
00288 if(empty($HTTP_SESSION_VARS['sess_user_name'])) $HTTP_SESSION_VARS['sess_user_name']='default';
00289

00292 #
00293 $HTTP_SESSION_VARS['sess_tos']=date('His');
00294

00297 #

00299

00303 require_once('include/inc_img_fx.php');
